channel.title: Rig_setup on Anthony Lynch
channel.description: Recent content in Rig_setup on Anthony Lynch

item.title: Rigging Spherical Eye Deformation
item.description: Eye Deformation Using SkinWeights, sine and cos I came across this article and thought this was a cool concept to try out. I was able to get something going, but I’ll have to give it more resolution in my next run. This setup took me about a day to figure out and hook up. I’ll post a more thorough update about the process soon.
